Package gw.bizrules.management

Interface BizRulesExportImportController

public interface BizRulesExportImportController
Business Rules Export invalid input: '&' Import Controller.

  • Method Details

    • createExportTasksQuery

      Query<RuleExportTask> createExportTasksQuery()
      Returns a query to get all RuleExportTask.

    • createExportTaskEntriesQuery

      Query<RuleExportTaskEntry> createExportTaskEntriesQuery(RuleExportTask exportTask)
      Returns a query to get all RuleExportTaskEntry corresponding to the given export task.

    • createImportTasksQuery

      Query<RuleImportTask> createImportTasksQuery()
      Returns a query to get all RuleImportTask.

    • createImportTaskEntriesQuery

      Query<RuleImportTaskEntry> createImportTaskEntriesQuery(RuleImportTask importTask)
      Returns a query to get all RuleImportTaskEntry corresponding to the given import task.

    • doesPendingImportExist

      @Deprecated boolean doesPendingImportExist()
      Deprecated.
      10.0.0 Use doesPendingImportExist(EntityTypeReference) instead.
      Returns true when there are rules pending import.

    • doesPendingImportExist

      boolean doesPendingImportExist(EntityTypeReference<? extends Rule> ruleTypeReference)
      Returns true when there are Rules pending import for the Rule subtype specified by the type reference.
      Parameters:
      ruleTypeReference - to the specific Rule subtype entity type
      Returns:
      Whether there are any pending imports.

    • createExportAllRequest

      @Deprecated RuleExportRequest createExportAllRequest()
      Deprecated.
      10.0.0 Use createExportAllRequest(EntityTypeReference) instead.
      Creates a request to export all rules.

    • createExportAllRequest

      RuleExportRequest createExportAllRequest(EntityTypeReference<? extends Rule> ruleTypeReference)
      Creates a request to export all rules of the specified subtype.
      Parameters:
      ruleTypeReference - to the specific Rule subtype entity type
      Returns:
      the created RuleExportRequest.

    • createExportRequest

      @Deprecated RuleExportRequest createExportRequest(Query<RuleVersion> query)
      Deprecated.
      10.0.0 Use createExportRequest(EntityTypeReference, Query) instead.
      Creates a request to export rules using the given query.

    • createExportRequest

      RuleExportRequest createExportRequest(EntityTypeReference<? extends Rule> ruleTypeReference, Query<RuleVersion> query)
      Creates a request to export rules using the specified query for the specified Rule subtype.
      Parameters:
      ruleTypeReference - to the specific Rule subtype entity type
      query - a query on the RuleVersions that link to the Rules of the specified subtype that are to be exported
      Returns:
      the created RuleExportRequest.

    • createExportRequest

      @Deprecated RuleExportRequest createExportRequest(List<RuleVersion> versions)
      Deprecated.
      10.0.0 Use createExportRequest(EntityTypeReference, List) instead.
      Creates a request to export the given rule versions.

    • createExportRequest

      RuleExportRequest createExportRequest(EntityTypeReference<? extends Rule> ruleTypeReference, List<RuleVersion> versions)
      Creates a request export the specifiedlist of rules of the specified Rule subtype.
      Parameters:
      ruleTypeReference - to the specific Rule subtype entity type
      versions - a list of the selected RuleVersions that link to the Rules of the specified subtype that are to be exported
      Returns:
      the created RuleExportRequest

    • startRulesImportFromStream

      RuleImportTask startRulesImportFromStream(String fileName, InputStream inputStream) throws IOException
      Initiates rule import from stream. This process does not modify the current head versions. The import must be explicitly completed.
      Returns:
      created import task, which can be used to monitor the import progress, status.
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      • completeImport(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry)
      • discardImport(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry)
      • resolveImportConflict(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry, typekey.RuleImportSide, boolean)

    • startSynchronousRulesImportFromStream

      RuleImportTask startSynchronousRulesImportFromStream(String fileName, InputStream inputStream) throws IOException
      Initiates synchronous rule import from stream without starting a batch process. This process does not modify the current head versions. The import must be explicitly completed.
      Returns:
      created import task, which can be used to monitor the import progress, status.
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      • completeImport(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry)
      • discardImport(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry)
      • resolveImportConflict(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry, typekey.RuleImportSide, boolean)

    • startRulesImportFromWebFile

      RuleImportTask startRulesImportFromWebFile(WebFile webFile) throws IOException
      Initiates rule import from web file. This process does not modify the current head versions. The import must be explicitly completed.
      Returns:
      created import task, which can be used to monitor the import progress, status.
      Throws:
      IOException
      See Also:
      • completeImport(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry)
      • discardImport(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry)
      • resolveImportConflict(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry, typekey.RuleImportSide, boolean)

    • getRulesFileExtension

      String getRulesFileExtension()
      Returns the used rule file format extension.
      Returns:
      the file extension

    • requestExportImportTaskTermination

      void requestExportImportTaskTermination(RuleExportImportTask task)
      Requests the given RuleExportImportTask termination. The termination process is asynchronous.
      Parameters:
      task - a task to terminate

    • sendExportedRulesToWebClient

      void sendExportedRulesToWebClient(RuleExportTask task) throws IOException
      Sends exported rules to the web client.
      Parameters:
      task - Rule Export Task.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if nothing to send or no current HTTP response.
      IOException - if I/O error occurs.

    • completeImport

      void completeImport(RuleImportTaskEntry importTaskEntry)
      Marks the given import task entry as completed. If the import has a conflict it must be resolved first.
      Parameters:
      importTaskEntry - the import task entry to complete.
      See Also:
      • resolveImportConflict(entity.RuleImportTaskEntry, typekey.RuleImportSide, boolean)

    • discardImport

      void discardImport(RuleImportTaskEntry importTaskEntry)
      Marks the given import task entry as discarded.
      Parameters:
      importTaskEntry - the import task entry to discard.

    • resolveImportConflict

      void resolveImportConflict(RuleImportTaskEntry importTaskEntry, RuleImportSide chosenConflictSide, boolean createDraft)
      Resolves the import conflict using the given strategy.
      Parameters:
      importTaskEntry - the import task entry which has a conflict.
      chosenConflictSide - a rule content and a version status from this RuleImportSide will be used.
      createDraft - if true than a new draft version will be created, otherwise the rule will be copied as-is.

    • getImportingDeploymentIds

      Set<String> getImportingDeploymentIds(RuleImportTask task)
      Returns a set of deployment identifiers which do not exist in the current system and will be imported.
      Parameters:
      task - the import task
      Returns:
      a set of deployment identifiers.
